description:

Hello guys and gals, it's me Mutahar again! This time we take a look at how an app for outlaws known as "Ghost" was hijacked and taken down after a 10 year run. Thanks for watching!
Like, Comment and Subscribe for more videos!

This video was sponsored by Brilliant
title: The Biggest App For Criminals Just Got Taken Down...
